content: Implement Full-Text Search (3.1) - Backend search endpoint + Frontend SearchBar and results page
Implement User Profiles (3.2) - Backend profile endpoints + Frontend profile page
Implement Moderation Dashboard (3.3) - Admin moderation UI with report queue
Implement Persistent Bookmarks (3.4) - Backend model and endpoints + Frontend saved page
Run E2E tests to verify all features work correctly
Run validator agent to check implementation
